vectorizers: Contains configuration options on how to vectorize text vector queries.
name: The name to associate with this vectorizer configuration.
azureOpenAIParameters: Contains the parameters specific to Azure OpenAI embedding vectorization.
azureOpenAI_odataType: A URI fragment specifying the type of skill (typically fixed).
azureOpenAI_apiKey: API key of the designated Azure OpenAI resource.
azureOpenAI_authIdentity: The managed identity used for outbound connections.
azureOpenAI_userAssignedIdentity: Fully qualified Azure resource ID of a user-assigned managed identity.
azureOpenAI_context: Scope at which operations take place (default: /document).
azureOpenAI_deploymentId: ID of the Azure OpenAI model deployment.
azureOpenAI_dimensions: Number of embedding dimensions (supported for text-embedding-3 and later).
azureOpenAI_skillName: Optional skill name (defaults to an auto-generated name if omitted).
azureOpenAI_resourceUri: Resource URI of the Azure OpenAI resource.
customWebApiParameters: Specifies the properties of the user-defined vectorizer.
webApi_authIdentity: Managed identity used for outbound connections. If authResourceId is provided and identity is omitted, system-assigned identity is used.
webApi_authResourceId: Application ID / resource ID used to create the access token scope for the target endpoint.
webApi_httpHeaders: Headers required to make the HTTP request (JSON object).
webApi_httpMethod: HTTP method used for the request.
webApi_uri: URI of the Web API providing the vectorizer.
mapping_sourceContext: The source context used for selecting recursive inputs.
mapping_inputs: Recursive inputs used when creating a complex type.
mapping_targetName: Target name for the output (optional; defaults to name).
